```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```



## Including Plots



```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
df<-data.frame(lat=c(45.4642,45.5328,45.6983,45.3097,45.5416,45.5845),long=c(9.19,9.2257,9.6773,9.5037,10.2118,9.2744))
df %>%
leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(clusterOptions = markerClusterOptions())
```

## Including Plots

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
df<-data.frame(lat=c(45.4642,45.6983,45.3097,45.5416),long=c(9.19,9.6773,9.5037,10.2118))

```
